mapper.select: SELECT LPAD(NVL(MAX(CHG_NUM), 0) + 1, 4, '0') CHG_NUM FROM GIBU.TBRA_STAFF_ZONECHG WHERE CHG_BRAN = # { chgBran } AND CHG_DAY = # { chgDay }
mapper.insert: Insert into GIBU.TBRA_STAFF_ZONECHG ( ATTE, CHG_BRAN, CHG_DAY, INSPRES_ID, DSRCCNTY, ZIP_START, ZIP_END, INS_DATE, MNG_ZIP, CHG_NUM, STAFF_CD, BRAN_CD, REMAK ) values ( # { atte }, # { chgBran }, # { chgDay }, # { inspresId }, # { dsrccnty }, # { zipStart }, # { zipEnd }, SYSDATE, # { mngZip }, # { chgNum }, # { staffCd }, # { branCd }, # { remak } )
mapper.update: UPDATE GIBU.TBRA_UPSO SET STAFF_CD = # { staffCd }, MODPRES_ID = # { modpresId }, MOD_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE BRAN_CD = # { branCd } AND UPSO_CD IN( SELECT UPSO_CD FROM FIDU.TENV_POST X, GIBU.TBRA_UPSO Y WHERE X.BD_MNG_NUM = Y.UPSO_BD_MNG_NUM AND Y.BRAN_CD = # { branCd } AND SUBSTR(X.JUSO_CD, 1, 5) = # { mngZip } )
mapper.insert: Insert into GIBU.TBRA_STAFF_ZONECHG_DONG ( INS_DATE, INSPRES_ID, DONG, CHG_NUM, CHG_DAY, SEQ, BRAN_CD ) values ( SYSDATE, # { inspresId }, # { dong }, # { chgNum }, # { chgDay }, ( SELECT LPAD(NVL(MAX(SEQ), 0) + 1, 4, '0') SEQ FROM GIBU.TBRA_STAFF_ZONECHG_DONG WHERE BRAN_CD = # { seq1 } AND CHG_DAY = # { seq2 } AND CHG_NUM = # { seq3 } ), # { branCd } )
mapper.update: UPDATE GIBU.TBRA_UPSO SET STAFF_CD = # { staffCd }, MODPRES_ID = # { modpresId }, MOD_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE BRAN_CD = # { branCd } AND UPSO_CD IN ( SELECT A.UPSO_CD FROM GIBU.TBRA_UPSO A, FIDU.TENV_POST B WHERE A.BRAN_CD = # { branCd } AND A.UPSO_BD_MNG_NUM = B.BD_MNG_NUM AND B.ATTE = # { atte } AND B.CITYCNTYDSRC = # { dsrccnty } AND # { dong } = DECODE(COURT_NM, NULL, TOWNTWSHP, COURT_NM) )
mapper.select: SELECT '???' DONG, '000000' ZIP FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT DONG, ZIP FROM ( SELECT DONG || HNM DONG, ZIP FROM GIBU.TBRA_BRANZIP_MNG WHERE ATTE = # { atte } AND DSRCCNTY = # { dsrccnty } ORDER BY DONG )
SELECT DISTINCT DSRCCNTY, SUBSTR(ZIP, 1, 3) ZIP FROM GIBU.TBRA_BRANZIP_MNG WHERE ATTE = # { atte } ORDER BY DSRCCNTY
SELECT DISTINCT ATTE FROM GIBU.TBRA_BRANZIP_MNG ORDER BY ATTE
SELECT ( CASE WHEN # { yrmn } > '201312' THEN '1' ELSE '0' END ) GBN FROM DUAL

SELECT XA.CHG_DAY, XA.CHG_NUM, XA.CHG_BRAN, XA.STAFF_CD || ' ' || XD.HAN_NM STAFF, XA.STAFF_CD, XD.HAN_NM STAFF_NM, XA.ZIP_START || ' ~ ' || XA.ZIP_END ZIP, XA.ZIP_START, XA.ZIP_END, XB.ALLADDR || ' (' || XB.ZIP || ')' || ' ~ ' || XC.ALLADDR || ' (' || XC.ZIP || ')' ADDR, XB.ALLADDR ADDR_START, XC.ALLADDR ADDR_END, XA.REMAK, XA.ATTE, XA.DSRCCNTY, XA.MNG_ZIP FROM GIBU.TBRA_STAFF_ZONECHG XA, GIBU.TBRA_BRANZIP_MNG XB, GIBU.TBRA_BRANZIP_MNG XC, INSA.TINS_MST01 XD, ( SELECT A.CHG_DAY, A.CHG_NUM, MIN(POST_SNUM) MIN_SNUM, MAX(POST_SNUM) MAX_SNUM FROM GIBU.TBRA_STAFF_ZONECHG A, GIBU.TBRA_BRANZIP_MNG B WHERE A.BRAN_CD = # { branCd } AND A.CHG_DAY BETWEEN # { yrmn } || '00' AND # { yrmn } || '32' AND B.ZIP BETWEEN A.ZIP_START AND A.ZIP_END GROUP BY A.CHG_DAY, A.CHG_NUM ) XE WHERE XA.BRAN_CD = # { branCd } AND XA.CHG_DAY = XE.CHG_DAY AND XA.CHG_NUM = XE.CHG_NUM AND XB.POST_SNUM = XE.MIN_SNUM AND XC.POST_SNUM = XE.MAX_SNUM AND XD.STAFF_NUM(+) = XA.STAFF_CD ORDER BY XA.CHG_DAY, XA.CHG_NUM

SELECT XA.CHG_DAY, XA.CHG_NUM, XA.CHG_BRAN, XA.STAFF_CD || ' ' || XD.HAN_NM STAFF, XA.STAFF_CD, XD.HAN_NM STAFF_NM, ATTE || ' ' || DSRCCNTY ZIP, '' ZIP_START, '' ZIP_END, XA.REMAK ADDR, '' ADDR_START, '' ADDR_END, XA.REMAK, XA.ATTE, XA.DSRCCNTY, XA.MNG_ZIP FROM GIBU.TBRA_STAFF_ZONECHG XA, INSA.TINS_MST01 XD WHERE XA.BRAN_CD = # { branCd } AND XA.CHG_DAY BETWEEN # { yrmn } || '00' AND # { yrmn } || '32' AND XD.STAFF_NUM(+) = XA.STAFF_CD ORDER BY XA.CHG_DAY, XA.CHG_NUM

SELECT A.UPSO_CD, '??????' AS GBN2, A.UPSO_ZIP AS ZIP, A.UPSO_ADDR1 || ' ' || A.UPSO_ADDR2 AS ADDR, A.UPSO_NEW_ZIP AS NEW_ZIP, A.UPSO_NEW_ZIP1 AS NEW_ZIP1, A.UPSO_NEW_ADDR1 AS NEW_ADDR1, A.UPSO_NEW_ADDR2 AS NEW_ADDR2, A.UPSO_REF_INFO AS REF_INFO, A.UPSO_BD_MNG_NUM AS BD_MNG_NUM, A.MNG_ZIP FROM GIBU.TBRA_UPSO A, FIDU.TENV_POST B WHERE A.BRAN_CD = # { branCd } AND A.UPSO_BD_MNG_NUM = B.BD_MNG_NUM(+) AND ( A.UPSO_BD_MNG_NUM IS NULL OR B.BD_MNG_NUM IS NULL ) AND A.STAFF_CD = NVL(# { staffCd }, A.STAFF_CD) ORDER BY 1

SELECT A.UPSO_CD, '????' AS GBN2, A.MNGEMSTR_ZIP AS ZIP, A.MNGEMSTR_ADDR1 || ' ' || A.MNGEMSTR_ADDR2 AS ADDR, A.MNGEMSTR_NEW_ZIP AS NEW_ZIP, A.MNGEMSTR_NEW_ZIP1 AS NEW_ZIP1, A.MNGEMSTR_NEW_ADDR1 AS NEW_ADDR1, A.MNGEMSTR_NEW_ADDR2 AS NEW_ADDR2, A.MNGEMSTR_REF_INFO AS REF_INFO, A.MNGEMSTR_BD_MNG_NUM AS BD_MNG_NUM, A.MNG_ZIP FROM GIBU.TBRA_UPSO A, FIDU.TENV_POST B WHERE A.BRAN_CD = # { branCd } AND A.MNGEMSTR_BD_MNG_NUM = B.BD_MNG_NUM(+) AND ( A.MNGEMSTR_BD_MNG_NUM IS NULL OR B.BD_MNG_NUM IS NULL ) AND A.STAFF_CD = NVL(# { staffCd }, A.STAFF_CD) AND trim(A.MNGEMSTR_ADDR1 || A.MNGEMSTR_ADDR2) IS NOT NULL AND A.CLSBS_YRMN IS NULL ORDER BY 1

SELECT A.UPSO_CD, '????' AS GBN2, A.PERMMSTR_ZIP AS ZIP, A.PERMMSTR_ADDR1 || ' ' || A.PERMMSTR_ADDR2 AS ADDR, A.PERMMSTR_NEW_ZIP AS NEW_ZIP, A.PERMMSTR_NEW_ZIP1 AS NEW_ZIP1, A.PERMMSTR_NEW_ADDR1 AS NEW_ADDR1, A.PERMMSTR_NEW_ADDR2 AS NEW_ADDR2, A.PERMMSTR_REF_INFO AS REF_INFO, A.PERMMSTR_BD_MNG_NUM AS BD_MNG_NUM, A.MNG_ZIP FROM GIBU.TBRA_UPSO A, FIDU.TENV_POST B WHERE A.BRAN_CD = # { branCd } AND A.PERMMSTR_BD_MNG_NUM = B.BD_MNG_NUM(+) AND ( A.PERMMSTR_BD_MNG_NUM IS NULL OR B.BD_MNG_NUM IS NULL ) AND A.STAFF_CD = NVL(# { staffCd }, A.STAFF_CD) AND trim(A.PERMMSTR_ADDR1 || A.PERMMSTR_ADDR2) IS NOT NULL AND A.CLSBS_YRMN IS NULL ORDER BY 1

SELECT A.UPSO_CD, '??????' AS GBN2, A.UPSO_ZIP AS ZIP, A.UPSO_ADDR1 || ' ' || A.UPSO_ADDR2 AS ADDR, A.UPSO_NEW_ZIP AS NEW_ZIP, A.UPSO_NEW_ZIP1 AS NEW_ZIP1, A.UPSO_NEW_ADDR1 AS NEW_ADDR1, A.UPSO_NEW_ADDR2 AS NEW_ADDR2, A.UPSO_REF_INFO AS REF_INFO, A.UPSO_BD_MNG_NUM AS BD_MNG_NUM, A.MNG_ZIP FROM GIBU.TBRA_UPSO A, FIDU.TENV_POST B WHERE A.BRAN_CD = # { branCd } AND A.UPSO_BD_MNG_NUM = B.BD_MNG_NUM(+) AND ( A.UPSO_BD_MNG_NUM IS NULL OR B.BD_MNG_NUM IS NULL ) AND A.STAFF_CD = NVL(# { staffCd }, A.STAFF_CD) UNION SELECT A.UPSO_CD, '????' AS GBN2, A.MNGEMSTR_ZIP AS ZIP, A.MNGEMSTR_ADDR1 || ' ' || A.MNGEMSTR_ADDR2 AS ADDR, A.MNGEMSTR_NEW_ZIP AS NEW_ZIP, A.MNGEMSTR_NEW_ZIP1 AS NEW_ZIP1, A.MNGEMSTR_NEW_ADDR1 AS NEW_ADDR1, A.MNGEMSTR_NEW_ADDR2 AS NEW_ADDR2, A.MNGEMSTR_REF_INFO AS REF_INFO, A.MNGEMSTR_BD_MNG_NUM AS BD_MNG_NUM, A.MNG_ZIP FROM GIBU.TBRA_UPSO A, FIDU.TENV_POST B WHERE A.BRAN_CD = # { branCd } AND A.MNGEMSTR_BD_MNG_NUM = B.BD_MNG_NUM(+) AND ( A.MNGEMSTR_BD_MNG_NUM IS NULL OR B.BD_MNG_NUM IS NULL ) AND A.STAFF_CD = NVL(# { staffCd }, A.STAFF_CD) AND trim(A.MNGEMSTR_ADDR1 || A.MNGEMSTR_ADDR2) IS NOT NULL AND A.CLSBS_YRMN IS NULL UNION SELECT A.UPSO_CD, '????' AS GBN2, A.PERMMSTR_ZIP AS ZIP, A.PERMMSTR_ADDR1 || ' ' || A.PERMMSTR_ADDR2 AS ADDR, A.PERMMSTR_NEW_ZIP AS NEW_ZIP, A.PERMMSTR_NEW_ZIP1 AS NEW_ZIP1, A.PERMMSTR_NEW_ADDR1 AS NEW_ADDR1, A.PERMMSTR_NEW_ADDR2 AS NEW_ADDR2, A.PERMMSTR_REF_INFO AS REF_INFO, A.PERMMSTR_BD_MNG_NUM AS BD_MNG_NUM, A.MNG_ZIP FROM GIBU.TBRA_UPSO A, FIDU.TENV_POST B WHERE A.BRAN_CD = # { branCd } AND A.PERMMSTR_BD_MNG_NUM = B.BD_MNG_NUM(+) AND ( A.PERMMSTR_BD_MNG_NUM IS NULL OR B.BD_MNG_NUM IS NULL ) AND A.STAFF_CD = NVL(# { staffCd }, A.STAFF_CD) AND trim(A.PERMMSTR_ADDR1 || A.PERMMSTR_ADDR2) IS NOT NULL AND A.CLSBS_YRMN IS NULL ORDER BY 1

SELECT A.UPSO_CD, '??????' AS GBN2, A.UPSO_ZIP AS ZIP, A.UPSO_ADDR1 || ' ' || A.UPSO_ADDR2 AS ADDR, A.UPSO_NEW_ZIP AS NEW_ZIP, A.UPSO_NEW_ZIP1 AS NEW_ZIP1, A.UPSO_NEW_ADDR1 AS NEW_ADDR1, A.UPSO_NEW_ADDR2 AS NEW_ADDR2, A.UPSO_REF_INFO AS REF_INFO, A.UPSO_BD_MNG_NUM AS BD_MNG_NUM, A.MNG_ZIP FROM GIBU.TBRA_UPSO A WHERE A.BRAN_CD = # { branCd } AND A.UPSO_BD_MNG_NUM IS NOT NULL AND A.STAFF_CD = NVL(# { staffCd }, A.STAFF_CD) ORDER BY 1

SELECT A.UPSO_CD, '??????' AS GBN2, A.UPSO_ZIP AS ZIP, A.UPSO_ADDR1 || ' ' || A.UPSO_ADDR2 AS ADDR, A.UPSO_NEW_ZIP AS NEW_ZIP, A.UPSO_NEW_ZIP1 AS NEW_ZIP1, A.UPSO_NEW_ADDR1 AS NEW_ADDR1, A.UPSO_NEW_ADDR2 AS NEW_ADDR2, A.UPSO_REF_INFO AS REF_INFO, A.UPSO_BD_MNG_NUM AS BD_MNG_NUM, A.MNG_ZIP FROM GIBU.TBRA_UPSO A WHERE A.BRAN_CD = # { branCd } AND A.UPSO_BD_MNG_NUM IS NOT NULL AND A.STAFF_CD = NVL(# { staffCd }, A.STAFF_CD) UNION SELECT A.UPSO_CD, '????' AS GBN2, A.PERMMSTR_ZIP AS ZIP, A.PERMMSTR_ADDR1 || ' ' || A.PERMMSTR_ADDR2 AS ADDR, A.PERMMSTR_NEW_ZIP AS NEW_ZIP, A.PERMMSTR_NEW_ZIP1 AS NEW_ZIP1, A.PERMMSTR_NEW_ADDR1 AS NEW_ADDR1, A.PERMMSTR_NEW_ADDR2 AS NEW_ADDR2, A.PERMMSTR_REF_INFO AS REF_INFO, A.PERMMSTR_BD_MNG_NUM AS BD_MNG_NUM, A.MNG_ZIP FROM GIBU.TBRA_UPSO A WHERE A.BRAN_CD = # { branCd } AND A.PERMMSTR_BD_MNG_NUM IS NOT NULL AND A.STAFF_CD = NVL(# { staffCd }, A.STAFF_CD) AND trim(A.PERMMSTR_ADDR1 || A.PERMMSTR_ADDR2) IS NOT NULL AND A.CLSBS_YRMN IS NULL ORDER BY 1

SELECT A.UPSO_CD, '??????' AS GBN2, A.UPSO_ZIP AS ZIP, A.UPSO_ADDR1 || ' ' || A.UPSO_ADDR2 AS ADDR, A.UPSO_NEW_ZIP AS NEW_ZIP, A.UPSO_NEW_ZIP1 AS NEW_ZIP1, A.UPSO_NEW_ADDR1 AS NEW_ADDR1, A.UPSO_NEW_ADDR2 AS NEW_ADDR2, A.UPSO_REF_INFO AS REF_INFO, A.UPSO_BD_MNG_NUM AS BD_MNG_NUM, A.MNG_ZIP FROM GIBU.TBRA_UPSO A WHERE A.BRAN_CD = # { branCd } AND A.STAFF_CD = NVL(# { staffCd }, A.STAFF_CD) UNION SELECT A.UPSO_CD, '????' AS GBN2, A.MNGEMSTR_ZIP AS ZIP, A.MNGEMSTR_ADDR1 || ' ' || A.MNGEMSTR_ADDR2 AS ADDR, A.MNGEMSTR_NEW_ZIP AS NEW_ZIP, A.MNGEMSTR_NEW_ZIP1 AS NEW_ZIP1, A.MNGEMSTR_NEW_ADDR1 AS NEW_ADDR1, A.MNGEMSTR_NEW_ADDR2 AS NEW_ADDR2, A.MNGEMSTR_REF_INFO AS REF_INFO, A.MNGEMSTR_BD_MNG_NUM AS BD_MNG_NUM, A.MNG_ZIP FROM GIBU.TBRA_UPSO A WHERE A.BRAN_CD = # { branCd } AND A.STAFF_CD = NVL(# { staffCd }, A.STAFF_CD) AND trim(A.MNGEMSTR_ADDR1 || A.MNGEMSTR_ADDR2) IS NOT NULL AND A.CLSBS_YRMN IS NULL UNION SELECT A.UPSO_CD, '????' AS GBN2, A.PERMMSTR_ZIP AS ZIP, A.PERMMSTR_ADDR1 || ' ' || A.PERMMSTR_ADDR2 AS ADDR, A.PERMMSTR_NEW_ZIP AS NEW_ZIP, A.PERMMSTR_NEW_ZIP1 AS NEW_ZIP1, A.PERMMSTR_NEW_ADDR1 AS NEW_ADDR1, A.PERMMSTR_NEW_ADDR2 AS NEW_ADDR2, A.PERMMSTR_REF_INFO AS REF_INFO, A.PERMMSTR_BD_MNG_NUM AS BD_MNG_NUM, A.MNG_ZIP FROM GIBU.TBRA_UPSO A WHERE A.BRAN_CD = # { branCd } AND A.STAFF_CD = NVL(# { staffCd }, A.STAFF_CD) AND trim(A.PERMMSTR_ADDR1 || A.PERMMSTR_ADDR2) IS NOT NULL AND A.CLSBS_YRMN IS NULL ORDER BY 1
